name: scalb
description:
Returns the result of `d * 2 ^ scaleFactor`,
Similar to Java's `scalb` function. Result is rounded as if
performed by a single correctly rounded floating-point multiply
to a member of the double value set.

params.name: d
params.description: Numeric expression for the multiplier. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: scaleFactor
params.description: Numeric expression for the scale factor. If `null`, the function returns `null`.
